Description: The root container for an A2UI message containing surfaces and components.
A map defining named entry points (viewports) for the UI.
An adjacency list (array) containing all UI component definitions.
The version of the A2UI specification being used (e.g. 0.8).
A single UI element definition within the components array.
A unique string identifier for a specific component.
The widget type to be rendered (e.g. text button container).
A map of static configuration properties for the component.
A map of dynamic state or values bound to the component.
An array of component IDs that are nested within this component.
A map of interaction triggers (e.g. onClick) to actions.
A declarative description of what happens when an event triggers.
An event type triggered by a pointer click or tap.
An event type triggered by a value change in an input.
An event type triggered by a form or group submission.
